    | text      = We don't get any explanation of that, but Chrysalix.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:20.800
    | text      = I mean, just draw me one of the glyphs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:22.400
    | text      = It should be really easy for you to draw me one of those glyphs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:25.960
    | text      = You said you studied them, you speak the language, you've got remote viewers, you've got ancient
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:29.679
    | text      = texts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:30.679
    | text      = Draw me a glyph.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:31.679
    | text      = We should be able to get some of these glyphs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:32.679
    | text      = Just give me a glyph.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:34.000
    | text      = But I do think that it's- Chrysalix.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:36.639
    | text      = It's interesting that the way that this guy is presenting this ancient fight or ancient
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:41.599
    | text      = wars is that there was a person who pitted two groups against each other, and there's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:46.960
    | text      = a sense of him recognizing that that is a bad thing to do, and I think that that's important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:55.599
    | text      = When we see these types of transpositions, if you might, these ideas of how people are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:03.820
    | text      = reacting to the situations currently transposed onto aliens doing it, and that's how they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:08.039
    | text      = process that information, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:10.199
    | text      = This has a different type of self-awareness to it than what we have seen before.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:15.360
    | text      = That's what I feel from what we're listening to here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:17.619
    | text      = But also, I think that if you're doing that kind of almost meta reading of the stuff that's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:24.840
    | text      = being discussed, oftentimes the actual conversation that's happening on that other level, that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:31.800
    | text      = metaphorical level, is really fucked up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:34.840
    | text      = It's scary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:35.840
    | text      = But what he's actually talking about, and some of the other stuff that'll come up later,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:40.139
    | text      = if it is metaphorical, there is a very positive message behind it for the most part.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:46.039
    | text      = Yeah, I mean, he's basically describing some sort of, I don't know, populist leader that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:51.860
    | text      = comes to power, who then uses a imaginary conflict to stoke resentment, and then continues-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:58.800
    | text      = Between these two groups.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:40:59.800
    | text      = Yeah, I mean, boy, it just seems like I've never heard that before.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:03.239
    | text      = Crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:04.239
    | text      = So, you might be asking yourself, how'd this guy start out talking to animals?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:09.219
    | text      = How did that work?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:10.219
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:11.219
    | text      = Because it is- Was that on one of the tests in high school?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:14.440
    | text      = No, it was not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:16.440
    | text      = Actually, I'll be honest, I've done exactly what he did, and I have not been successful.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:23.400
    | text      = In the course of developing the human-animal communication techniques, I first started
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:30.480
    | text      = experimenting having telepathic conversations with my cat, Gnome, and progressed from there
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:40.000
    | text      = to laboratory tests where I communicated with chimpanzees, pigs, dolphins.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:51.360
    | text      = We discovered there was a hard limit, that we could only achieve communication using
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:41:57.960
    | text      = this technique with placental mammals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:00.280
    | text      = Carrie, I have stared for hours at kangaroos.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:04.159
    | text      = Nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:05.159
    | text      = Silence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:06.159
    | text      = They're very quiet minds.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:12.199
    | text      = One of the other things that's admirable about his world that he's painting is that there
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:17.260
    | text      = are rules.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:18.260
    | text      = No, this is- There are parameters to what he's talking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:21.360
    | text      = about that you stay within.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:23.039
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:24.039
    | text      = And it's like, yeah, look, I have figured this out, and it has to do with the corpus
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:27.960
    | text      = callosum, there's telepathic tendrils in there, and if you stimulate them, he's able to talk
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:32.920
    | text      = to the placental mammals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:35.400
    | text      = Totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:36.400
    | text      = It makes sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:37.400
    | text      = Yeah, you can't talk to something that's not placental, it doesn't have the corpus callosum.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:41.239
    | text      = Of course not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:42.239
    | text      = Duh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:43.239
    | text      = Duh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:44.239
    | text      = No, it is that any great science fiction always has the same basic fundamental of, as long
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:49.139
    | text      = as you establish these rules in the beginning and do not break them, then you can do any
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:53.840
    | text      = imaginary bullshit you want to.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:55.960
    | text      = And he has fairly decent rules established.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:42:59.119
    | text      = And if you tell me that you've tried staring at kangaroos for hours and failed on this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:04.119
    | text      = show, you won.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:05.840
    | text      = You won the show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:07.760
    | text      = That's it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:08.760
    | text      = The only thing I really take issue with so far is I want more details about Mars-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:11.719
    | text      = You need more Mars details.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:12.719
    | text      = And the Sasquatch etymology is very much dubious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:15.960
    | text      = In question.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:17.960
    | text      = How long have you- How do you know that a 200- How do you know the Squatch is telling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:22.519
    | text      = you the truth?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:23.519
    | text      = Squatch could lie.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:24.519
    | text      = Squatch can lie!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:25.519
    | text      = So in 2017, that was when the military found themselves a Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:29.639
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:30.639
    | text      = But at some point in probably 2017, the U.S. military captured one of these entities.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:45.519
    | text      = He is a young male Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:47.440
    | text      = Squatch!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:48.440
    | text      = What we would call a bachelor Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:51.760
    | text      = Aye.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:43:54.280
    | text      = He is approximately 300 years old.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:01.119
    | text      = And that is in Squatch terms about like a 22-year-old human.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:09.400
    | text      = So young.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:12.400
    | text      = I love the throwing around of terminology.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:14.920
    | text      = It's a bachelor Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:15.920
    | text      = It's a bachelor Squatch!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:16.920
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:17.920
    | text      = I do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:18.920
    | text      = That's a common expression.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:21.280
    | text      = It is always fun whenever you hear an actual scientist discuss a grouping of animals that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:27.280
    | text      = they've been studying for years and they'll be like, ah, the bachelors of the seal community
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:32.980
    | text      = are now challenging the- you know, like that kind of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:35.940
    | text      = And then you're just like, nope, you can't say that about Squatch though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:38.360
    | text      = Yeah, you can.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:39.360
    | text      = You can't do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:40.360
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:41.360
    | text      = You can.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:42.360
    | text      = Nope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:43.360
    | text      = You can.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:44.360
    | text      = You can't say that about Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:45.360
    | text      = Bachelor Squatch rolls off the tongue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:46.360
    | text      = You can't just do bachelor Squatch on me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:47.360
    | text      = I think that might be a good button for the future.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:49.360
    | text      = Bachelor Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:50.360
    | text      = I do like that one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:51.360
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:52.360
    | text      = Sasquatch with like a flower on his lapel.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:55.800
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:56.800
    | text      = Getting ready to go to prom or something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:57.800
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:58.800
    | text      = Fuck this bored ape nonsense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:44:59.800
    | text      = I want bachelor Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:01.679
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:02.719
    | text      = So there was a problem because the military had taken Squatch and they were wanting to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:08.559
    | text      = use him for evil somehow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:11.559
    | text      = Well, I mean, they're the military.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:13.440
    | text      = Well, they wanted to use him for propaganda, basically, is the thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:17.960
    | text      = And so Black Kraken had to step in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:20.039
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:21.039
    | text      = And save that Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:22.039
    | text      = Save all Squatches.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:23.039
    | text      = It came to light that both of the factions I mentioned earlier, the interstellar factions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:31.360
    | text      = had an interest in using the existence of the Squatch and its species history with both
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:41.159
    | text      = the Draco and Pleiadian empires propagandistically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:47.300
    | text      = And because of our government's infiltration by Dracos, it was a decision we made as Project
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:45:57.840
    | text      = Black Kraken to remove the Squatch from Draco influences here in the United States.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:06.800
    | text      = Got to remove that Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:09.199
    | text      = This makes me think, all right, that we're not the only ones who have spent an inordinate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:16.599
    | text      = amount of time in the Pacific Northwest looking for Sasquatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:20.360
    | text      = I think aliens have also been out there looking for the elusive Squatch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:24.119
    | text      = Well, yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:25.119
    | text      = I mean, well, so yeah, because they want to use them for propaganda.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:27.840
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:28.840
    | text      = So if I understand this correctly, as things will be sort of teased out in this conversation,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:34.000
    | text      = the Squatch is a refugee from both Draco and Pleiadian territories.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:40.519
    | text      = Sweet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:41.519
    | text      = Right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:42.519
    | text      = And so they're here and conceivably on other planets too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:45.719
    | text      = We don't know that for sure, but they're here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:48.719
    | text      = And so both of those groups want to use the existence of these refugees against the other.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:46:56.480
    | text      = And so the Draco are in charge of the US government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:00.079
    | text      = And so Black Kraken felt that they needed to remove the Squatch so they couldn't use
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:03.920
    | text      = them against the Pleiadians.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:06.619
    | text      = So they went to Israel, which apparently is under the Anunnaki.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:12.280
    | text      = The Anunnaki apparently are in Israel.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:14.159
    | text      = I mean, it's questioned territory, so it's relatively safe in a certain way because everybody's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:19.000
    | text      = trying to have their own, you know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:20.559
    | text      = Well, but the Israeli government, Kerry is pretty certain, is deeply involved with the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:24.679
    | text      = Anunnaki.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:25.679
    | text      = That is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:26.679
    | text      = But that is not specifically full Draco.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:28.199
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:29.199
    | text      = It's like half reptilian, half human.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:30.679
    | text      = See again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:31.679
    | text      = More or less.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:32.679
    | text      = It's somewhere in a nebulous space.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:33.679
    | text      = It's a good place to hide.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:34.820
    | text      = And that's why they went there into an underground bunker 80 clicks outside of Tel Aviv.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:39.840
    | text      = Sure, sure, sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:40.840
    | text      = They're keeping Squatch underground.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:42.159
    | text      = I think that just means that we need to have more respect for Squatches if not only are
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:47.039
    | text      = they evading humans, but indeed the entire universe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:50.599
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:51.599
    | text      = Well, at this point they're only doing it because of the help of Black Kraken.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:55.719
    | text      = Ah, that's fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:56.719
    | text      = That is fair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:47:57.719
    | text      = Otherwise they would be found by the US government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:00.199
    | text      = And then the Draco.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:48:01.199
